articles.title: Mysterious rumblings from inside of Mars detected by NASA lander - Sky News
articles.description: The space agency's scientists believe the seismic events are caused by a sudden release of energy from the planet's interior.

articles.author: Stacy Liberatore
articles.title: Ingenuity SURVIVES its first night on Mars where it endured -130F temperatures - Daily Mail
articles.description: NASA's Ingenuity helicopter has survived its first night on Mars where it endured -130F temperatures that could have froze the copter or cracked its key key components.
articles.content:
NASA's Ingenuity helicopter has survived its first night on Mars, following the deployment from the belly of the Perseverance rover Saturday.
The $85 million copter completed the first major test of… [+5792 chars]

articles.author: Dan Avery
articles.title: Physicist says alien life will be found within the century, but making contact is 'a terrible idea' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Noted futurist Michio Kaku said we can't gamble on aliens being friendly. 'We all know what happened to Montezuma when he met Cortés in Mexico so many hundreds of years ago,' he told The Guardian.
articles.content:
Contact with alien life is just around the corner, according to leading physicist, but we shouldn't expect it to be friendly.
String theory expert and futurist Michio Kaku believes we'll find signs … [+5877 chars]

articles.title: Huge chunk of SpaceX rocket falls on Washington farm - The Independent
articles.description: SpaceX has retrieved a composite-overwrapped pressure vessel from Falcon 9 re-entry found on private property
articles.content:
